I fix all the errors by move all de=
pendent heritrix jars from webapp lib into jdk/ext/lib because tomcat first=
 load jars from ext.
Now i got another problem, crawler start and finishes =
almost in the same time, crawl.log is not empty but crawl status is notCraw=
led.

Any ideas ?

Yes, Heritrix comes with its own (patched) =
HTTPClient implementation.
Is there a way to override tomcats httpclient in=
 this case, or should i run heritrix on another server to avoid conflict?
W=
hen i put patched httpClient in tomcat common lib dir i get DNS error, when=
 its in webapp lib dir i get nosuchmethoderror(setCookieMap).

r as I remember. So running inside a tomcat you might have conflicting libs=
 ?

best
